channel.title: CruiseControl 2.7.1 RC3 - now with TFS Support!
channel.description: Paul Julius just announced that RC3 of CruiseControl 2.7.1 has been released from the Agile 2007 conference.  From my point of view this is fantastic news, because it includes a patch I submitted to the project to include integration between...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Hey Martin+00:00
item.description:
Martin,
Any update on whether the VSTF plugin works for CruiseControl.NET v1.3?
I hear it works for 1.1 but what about 1.3?
Could you please email me back?
Thanks.
item.dc:creator: Hey Martin

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description: Yup, the CruiseControl.NET integration works with CCNET 1.3. I've just done a new release to include some patches that have recently been submited and tested against that and all seems to be working fine.
item.dc:creator: Martin
